interactive_elements.name: Category List Items
interactive_elements.description: Each list item represents a category with the number of ASCII arts. Essential for extracting the desired information.

interactive_elements.name: Category Links
interactive_elements.description: Links for navigating to specific categories.  Important for extracting the category name.

interactive_elements.name: Category Item Count
interactive_elements.description: Span element containing the number of items in the category. Important for extracting the count.

actions.instructions: Extract the text content of each category list item, which includes the category name and item count.
Task completed: Extracted all categories and their corresponding item counts.
actions.text: Extracted all categories with the corresponding number of items in brackets.
